## Hi there!

Welcome to my website! My name is Qinya (approximatly pronounced as /chinya/). I am currently a PhD student in Political Science at the [Department of Government, Uppsala University](https://www.uu.se/institution/statsvetenskapliga/). I am affiliated with the Swedish Research Council funded project [The genetics of life course outcomes: Leveraging new methods to advance social-science genomics](https://www.uu.se/en/department/government/research/the-genetics-of-life-course-outcomes-leveraging-new-methods-to-advance-social-science-genomics).

### Research interests
My research fields are political psychology and social science genomics.
